graphql.query:
query plainReportQuery($input: [BankReportInput!]) {
          qualify(plain: { reportId:"{{reportId}}", report: $input }) {
            id
            status
            customerId
            customerLmsUrl
            customerName
            customerNameEntered
            customerNameFound
            customerEmail
            bankName
            routingNumber
            routingNumberEntered
            routingNumberFound
            accountNumber
            accountNumberEntered
            accountNumberFound
            checkDate
            achSupported
            currentBalance
            availableBalance
            avgBalanceLastMonth
            avgBalanceLastTwoMonth
            avgBalanceLastThreeMonth
            accountType
            accountName
            transactionsCount
            transactions {
              id
              amount
              balance
              description
              date
              hasLoanCompany
              hasCollectionCompany
              loanCompany {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                deletedAt
                name
                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId
                consumer {
                  id
                }
                createdBy
                updatedBy
                deletedBy
                removedCompanies {
                  id
                }
              }
              collectionCompany {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                deletedAt
                name
                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId
                consumer {
                  id
                }
                createdBy
                updatedBy
                deletedBy
                removedCompanies {
                  id
                }
              }
              className
              status
              related {
                id
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              eodBalance
              nextEodBalance
            }
            income {
              frequency
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  id
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              group
              total
              active
              transactionsCount
              duration
              avgMonthly
              avgPayroll
              matchedDays
              matchedDaysText
              avgEodBalance
              avgNextEodBalance
              avgBalance
              primary
              calculatedDuration
              manual
              consistency
              regularity
            }
            redFlags {
              name
              code
              detected
              transactionsCount
              amount
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
            }
            creditExposure {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              pastLoansCount
              pastPrincipalAmount
              highestLoanAmountGiven
              paidBackAmount
              pendingBackAmount
              currentPrincipalAmount
            }
            loanInfo {
              total
              open
              totalExpectedDebit
              totalProjectedDebit
              activeOutstandingPrincipal
              inactiveOutstandingPrincipal
              averageInterest
              loans {
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                company {
                  name
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                }
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                projectedDebit
                possibleCollections
                sequence
                frequency
                transactions {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                  eodBalance
                }
                startDate
                endDate
              }
            }
            avgMonthlyBalances {
              month
              value
            }
            loanRisks {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              abilityToRepay
              isNewBankAccount
              hasCriticalChargeBacks
              hasLoanHistory
              isNewJob
              paymentFrequency
              numberOfPastLoans
              outstandingLoans
              avgMonthlyIncome
              avgPaydayBalance
            }
            loanDecision {
              status
              camDenyThreshold
              camApproveThreshold
              reason {
                id
                riskFactorNameId
                name
                action
              }
            }
            collections {
              active
          past
            }
            creditApprovingDecision {
              approvingScore
              maxScore
              minScore
            }
            fpdModelDecision {
              fpdScore
            }
            loanAmount
          }
        }

graphql.query:
query plainReportQuery($input: [BankReportInput!]) {
          qualify(plain: { reportId:"{{reportId}}", report: $input }) {
            id
            status
            customerId
            customerLmsUrl
            customerName
            customerNameEntered
            customerNameFound
            customerEmail
            bankName
            routingNumber
            routingNumberEntered
            routingNumberFound
            accountNumber
            accountNumberEntered
            accountNumberFound
            checkDate
            achSupported
            currentBalance
            availableBalance
            avgBalanceLastMonth
            avgBalanceLastTwoMonth
            avgBalanceLastThreeMonth
            accountType
            accountName
            transactionsCount
            transactions {
              id
              amount
              balance
              description
              date
              hasLoanCompany
              hasCollectionCompany
              loanCompany {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                deletedAt
                name
                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId
                consumer {
                  id
                }
                createdBy
                updatedBy
                deletedBy
                removedCompanies {
                  id
                }
              }
              collectionCompany {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                deletedAt
                name
                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId
                consumer {
                  id
                }
                createdBy
                updatedBy
                deletedBy
                removedCompanies {
                  id
                }
              }
              className
              status
              related {
                id
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              eodBalance
              nextEodBalance
            }
            income {
              frequency
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  id
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              group
              total
              active
              transactionsCount
              duration
              avgMonthly
              avgPayroll
              matchedDays
              matchedDaysText
              avgEodBalance
              avgNextEodBalance
              avgBalance
              primary
              calculatedDuration
              manual
              consistency
              regularity
            }
            redFlags {
              name
              code
              detected
              transactionsCount
              amount
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
            }
            creditExposure {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              pastLoansCount
              pastPrincipalAmount
              highestLoanAmountGiven
              paidBackAmount
              pendingBackAmount
              currentPrincipalAmount
            }
            loanInfo {
              total
              open
              totalExpectedDebit
              totalProjectedDebit
              activeOutstandingPrincipal
              inactiveOutstandingPrincipal
              averageInterest
              loans {
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                company {
                  name
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                }
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                projectedDebit
                possibleCollections
                sequence
                frequency
                transactions {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                  eodBalance
                }
                startDate
                endDate
              }
            }
            avgMonthlyBalances {
              month
              value
            }
            loanRisks {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              abilityToRepay
              isNewBankAccount
              hasCriticalChargeBacks
              hasLoanHistory
              isNewJob
              paymentFrequency
              numberOfPastLoans
              outstandingLoans
              avgMonthlyIncome
              avgPaydayBalance
            }
            loanDecision {
              status
              camDenyThreshold
              camApproveThreshold
              reason {
                id
                riskFactorNameId
                name
                action
              }
            }
            collections {
              active
          past
            }
            creditApprovingDecision {
              approvingScore
              maxScore
              minScore
            }
            fpdModelDecision {
              fpdScore
            }
            loanAmount
          }
        }

query plainReportQuery($input: [BankReportInput!]) {
          qualify(plain: { reportId:"{{reportId}}", report: $input }) {

            customerNameEntered
            customerNameFound

            routingNumber
            routingNumberEntered

              description
              date

              hasCollectionCompany

                id

                updatedAt
                deletedAt

                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id

                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId

                  id
                }

                updatedBy
                deletedBy

                  id
                }
              }
              collectionCompany {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                deletedAt
                name
                url
                description
                interestRate
                estimatedPeriods
                types {
                  id
                }
                alternateNames {
                  id
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                  name
                }
                companyTypes {
                  id
                }
                consumerId
                consumer {
                  id
                }
                createdBy
                updatedBy
                deletedBy
                removedCompanies {
                  id
                }
              }
              className
              status
              related {
                id
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              eodBalance
              nextEodBalance
            }
            income {
              frequency
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  id
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  id
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  id
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
              group
              total
              active
              transactionsCount
              duration
              avgMonthly
              avgPayroll
              matchedDays
              matchedDaysText
              avgEodBalance
              avgNextEodBalance
              avgBalance
              primary
              calculatedDuration
              manual
              consistency
              regularity
            }
            redFlags {
              name
              code
              detected
              transactionsCount
              amount
              transactions {
                amount
                balance
                description
                date
                hasLoanCompany
                hasCollectionCompany
                loanCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                collectionCompany {
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                }
                className
                status
                related {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                }
                eodBalance
                nextEodBalance
              }
            }
            creditExposure {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              pastLoansCount
              pastPrincipalAmount
              highestLoanAmountGiven
              paidBackAmount
              pendingBackAmount
              currentPrincipalAmount
            }
            loanInfo {
              total
              open
              totalExpectedDebit
              totalProjectedDebit
              activeOutstandingPrincipal
              inactiveOutstandingPrincipal
              averageInterest
              loans {
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                company {
                  name
                  createdAt
                  updatedAt
                  deletedAt
                }
                status
                expectedDebit
                estimatedOriginalPrincipal
                estimatedOutstandingPrincipal
                projectedDebit
                possibleCollections
                sequence
                frequency
                transactions {
                  amount
                  balance
                  description
                  date
                  hasLoanCompany
                  eodBalance
                }
                startDate
                endDate
              }
            }
            avgMonthlyBalances {
              month
              value
            }
            loanRisks {
              customerId
              allowedAmount
              abilityToRepay
              isNewBankAccount
              hasCriticalChargeBacks
              hasLoanHistory
              isNewJob
              paymentFrequency
              numberOfPastLoans
              outstandingLoans
              avgMonthlyIncome
              avgPaydayBalance
            }
            loanDecision {
              status
              camDenyThreshold
              camApproveThreshold
              reason {
                id
                riskFactorNameId
                name
                action
              }
            }
            collections {
              active
          past
            }
            creditApprovingDecision {
              approvingScore
              maxScore
              minScore
            }
            fpdModelDecision {
              fpdScore
            }
            loanAmount
          }
        }
